Package com.project.capstone.event

Class EventServiceAccess

java.lang.Object
com.project.capstone.event.EventServiceAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventService
@Service @Transactional public class EventServiceAccess extends Object implements EventService
The Event Service Implementation Class declaring functionality. Extends the EventService Interface Denoted with Spring Annotations to declare this Service class has rights to make backend data-layer SQL changes(Transactional)
